verses.verse: The <S%G746>beginning<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>;

<S%G5613>As<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%>, <S%G2400>Behold<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G649>send<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G32>messenger<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> shall <S%G2680>prepare<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3598>way<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%>.

The <S%G5456>voice<s%> of one <S%G994>crying<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%>, Prepare <S%G2090>ye<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5147>paths<s%> <S%G2117>straight<s%>.

<S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G1096>did<s%> <S%G907>baptize<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2784>preach<s%> the <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G859>remission<s%> of <S%G266>sins<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> there went <S%G1607>out<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G5561>land<s%> of <S%G2449>Judaea<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they of <S%G2415>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G907>were<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4215>river<s%> of <S%G2446>Jordan<s%>, <S%G1843>confessing<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1746>clothed<s%> with <S%G2574>camel's<s%> <S%G2359>hair<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> with a <S%G2223>girdle<s%> of a <S%G1193>skin<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3751>loins<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> he did <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G200>locusts<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G66>wild<s%> <S%G3192>honey<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2784>preached<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, There <S%G2064>cometh<s%> one mightier <S%G2478>than<s%> <S%G3450>I<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> <S%G3450>me<s%>, the <S%G2438>latchet<s%> of <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G846%G5266>shoes<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2425>worthy<s%> to stoop <S%G2955>down<s%> and <S%G3089>unloose<s%>.

<S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> have <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> shall <S%G907>baptize<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%>, that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3478>Nazareth<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> was <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2446>Jordan<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2112>straightway<s%> coming <S%G305>up<s%> out <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G5204>water<s%>, he <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G3772>heavens<s%> <S%G4977>opened<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G5616>like<s%> a <S%G4058>dove<s%> <S%G2597>descending<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> there <S%G1096>came<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, saying, <S%G4771>Thou<s%> <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I am well <S%G2106>pleased<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2117>immediately<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1544>driveth<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%>, <S%G3985>tempted<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the wild <S%G2342>beasts<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G1247>ministered<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> that <S%G2491>John<s%> was put in <S%G3860>prison<s%>, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>, <S%G2784>preaching<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>,

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3004%G3754>saying<s%>, The time <S%G2540><s%> is fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is at hand <S%G1448><s%> : repent ye <S%G3340><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> believe <S%G4100%G1722><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> .

<S%G1161>Now<s%> as he <S%G4043>walked<s%> <S%G3844>by<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>, he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G406>Andrew<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G906>casting<s%> a <S%G293>net<s%> <S%G1722>into<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G231>fishers<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Come ye <S%G1205><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> me <S%G3450><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> I will make <S%G4160><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> to become <S%G1096><s%> fishers <S%G231><s%> of men <S%G444><s%> .
<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2112>straightway<s%> they <S%G863>forsook<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1350>nets<s%>, and <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when he had <S%G4260>gone<s%> a <S%G3641>little<s%> <S%G4260>further<s%> <S%G1564>thence<s%>, he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> the <S%G3588>son<s%> of <S%G2199>Zebedee<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%>, <S%G846>who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> were <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4143>ship<s%> <S%G2675>mending<s%> their <S%G1350>nets<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2112>straightway<s%> he <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2199>Zebedee<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4143>ship<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the hired <S%G3411>servants<s%>, and <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G1531>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2584>Capernaum<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2112>straightway<s%> on the sabbath <S%G4521>day<s%> he <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%>, and <S%G1321>taught<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they were <S%G1605>astonished<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1322>doctrine<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G1321%G2258>taught<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> one that <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G1122>scribes<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> an <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> he cried <S%G349>out<s%>,

<S%G3004>Saying<s%>, Let us <S%G1436>alone<s%>; <S%G5101>what<s%> have <S%G2254>we<s%> to <S%G2532>do<s%> with <S%G4671>thee<s%>, thou <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> of <S%G3479>Nazareth<s%>? art thou <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G622>destroy<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%>? I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> thou <S%G1488>art<s%>, the Holy <S%G40>One<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, Hold thy peace <S%G5392><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> come <S%G1831><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> him <S%G846><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> when the <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> had <S%G4682>torn<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2896>cried<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%>, he <S%G1831>came<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G2284>were<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2284>amazed<s%>, insomuch <S%G5620>that<s%> they <S%G4802>questioned<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G846>themselves<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, What <S%G5101>thing<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%>? <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1322>doctrine<s%> is <S%G5124>this<s%>? <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G2596>with<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G2004>commandeth<s%> he <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they do <S%G5219>obey<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2117>immediately<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G189>fame<s%> spread <S%G1831>abroad<s%> <S%G1519>throughout<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> the region round <S%G4066>about<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2112>forthwith<s%>, when they were <S%G1831>come<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%>, they <S%G2064>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%> of <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G406>Andrew<s%>, <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4613>Simon's<s%> wife's <S%G3994>mother<s%> <S%G2621>lay<s%> sick of a <S%G4445>fever<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2112>anon<s%> they <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G846>her<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G2902>took<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> by the <S%G5495>hand<s%>, and <S%G1453>lifted<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G1453>up<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> the <S%G4446>fever<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G846>her<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> she <S%G1247>ministered<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1096>at<s%> <S%G3798>even<s%>, <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G2246>sun<s%> did <S%G1416>set<s%>, they <S%G5342>brought<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that <S%G2192>were<s%> <S%G2560>diseased<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> them that were possessed with <S%G1139>devils<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> gathered <S%G1996>together<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> the <S%G2374>door<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> that <S%G2192>were<s%> <S%G2560>sick<s%> of <S%G4164>divers<s%> <S%G3554>diseases<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> cast <S%G1544>out<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1140>devils<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G863>suffered<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G1140>devils<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G1492>knew<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> in the <S%G4404>morning<s%>, rising <S%G450>up<s%> a great <S%G3029>while<s%> before <S%G1773>day<s%>, he went <S%G1831>out<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G565>departed<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G2048>solitary<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%>, and <S%G2546>there<s%> <S%G4336>prayed<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they that were <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> followed <S%G2614>after<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> when they had <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, they <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846%G3754>him<s%>, <S%G3956>All<s%> men <S%G2212>seek<s%> for <S%G4571>thee<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Let us go <S%G71><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the next <S%G2192><s%> towns <S%G2969><s%> , that <S%G2443><s%> I may preach <S%G2784><s%> there also <S%G2546><s%> : for <S%G1063><s%> therefore <S%G1519%G5124><s%> came I forth <S%G1831><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2784%G2258>preached<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4864>synagogues<s%> <S%G1519>throughout<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> cast <S%G1544>out<s%> <S%G1140>devils<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> there <S%G2064>came<s%> a <S%G3015>leper<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3870>beseeching<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> kneeling <S%G1120>down<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> unto <S%G846%G3754>him<s%>, <S%G1437>If<s%> thou <S%G2309>wilt<s%>, thou <S%G1410>canst<s%> <S%G2511>make<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G2511>clean<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, moved with <S%G4697>compassion<s%>, put <S%G1614>forth<s%> his <S%G5495>hand<s%>, and <S%G680>touched<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, I will <S%G2309><s%> ; be thou clean <S%G2511><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> as soon as <S%G846>he<s%> had <S%G2036>spoken<s%>, <S%G2112>immediately<s%> the <S%G3014>leprosy<s%> <S%G565>departed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> he was <S%G2511>cleansed<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> he straitly <S%G1690>charged<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, and <S%G2112>forthwith<s%> <S%G1544>sent<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1544>away<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, See <S%G3708><s%> thou say <S%G2036><s%> nothing <S%G3367><s%> to any man <S%G3367><s%> : but <S%G235><s%> go thy way <S%G5217><s%> , shew <S%G1166><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%> to the priest <S%G2409><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> offer <S%G4374><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> cleansing <S%G2512><s%> those things <S%G3739><s%> which Moses <S%G3475><s%> commanded <S%G4367><s%> , for <S%G1519><s%> a testimony <S%G3142><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> .

<S%G1161>But<s%> he went <S%G1831>out<s%>, and <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G2784>publish<s%> it <S%G4183>much<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to blaze <S%G1310>abroad<s%> the <S%G3056>matter<s%>, insomuch <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G846>Jesus<s%> <S%G1410>could<s%> no <S%G3371>more<s%> <S%G5320>openly<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1854>without<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2048>desert<s%> <S%G5117>places<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> from every <S%G3836>quarter<s%>.
